name: Better Homes and Gardens Scroll Leaves Tufted Runner Rug, Red and Gold, 1'8" x 5'

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Scroll Leaves Tufted Runner Rug, Red and Gold, 1'8" x 5'
reviews.reviewText: The carpet is very soft (not scratchy or with a super tight weave), and features a rubber, non-slip backing similar to a bathroom mat, so it's great on hard surfaces without having to spend extra money on a pad for it. The color is a rich, deep wine red and not burgundy or orange-y, which was perfect for our home. I highly recommend this rug.
reviews.title: Great addition to our entryway

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Scroll Leaves Tufted Runner Rug, Red and Gold, 1'8" x 5'
reviews.reviewText: I have this rug in a larger size and I have washed it every week for months! I do not put it in the dryer and it has held up well. Now I got the runner and I love it too! The colors are beautiful and it is very durable. Great price!
reviews.title: Holds up well

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Scroll Leaves Tufted Runner Rug, Red and Gold, 1'8" x 5'
reviews.reviewText: After my initial purchase of the runner and the matching area rug pieces at Wal-Mart, I decided to purchase another runner on line. Color palate is burgundy and golden mustard. It compliments and matches the colors in the other area rugs throughout my home. The quality is excellent for the price that was paid. You donâ€™t have to buy a luxurious product to get the look of expensive taste.
reviews.title: Excellent price and quailty

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Scroll Leaves Tufted Runner Rug, Red and Gold, 1'8" x 5'
reviews.reviewText: Love this rug works perfectly. For our kitchen and looks great!
reviews.title: 15 August 2013

reviews.name: Better Homes and Gardens Scroll Leaves Tufted Runner Rug, Red and Gold, 1'8" x 5'
reviews.reviewText: Plush and rich looking. It goes well with my comforter set, as if I bought them together. Love my Walmart finds always.
reviews.title: Great looking runner rug.
